summary: A chilling tale based on a real event in which a doctor stepped out of line and sexually assaulted a patient when drugged.
cast: Estella Warren|John Hannah|John Kapelos|Brad Grass|Andrea Menard|Aaron Pearl|Daniel MacDonald|Velvette Neumann|Meghan Gabruch|Chris Scott|Madison Dewalt|Ron Anderson|Trevor Roberts|Tim Henry|Lindi Edge|Kathryn Bracht|Graham Bell|Regina Sagal-Henry|June Mayhew|Kayleigh Shikanai|Cavan Cunningham|Alan Bratt|Louise Handford|Amy Matysio|Tom Butler|Troy Skog|Lisa Marie Pollock|George Alexander|Bill Gardiner|Stephen Arsenych|Judith Maxie|Daniel Contreras
title: Yo acuso
